item.title: about
item.description:
Hiiiii, I am chubby

LEl_FENG named this mainly because of my wonderful inspiration doge at that time

Qing_Shaun messed up (

lbwnb21 is the name of my original MC account and also integrates my 2B2T memories

I am a high school student who loves tossing (Jala is a sophomore)

This blog was created by me at the age of 14 in 2022 (record)

  • Linux Windows Party
  • Favorite editors are VS Code and EditPlus
  • Know some PV production and photography (PR, PS) and have done PV editing
  • Now learning to draw

My tags: post-00s, INTP personality, love of technology, uncomfortable without tossing, minimalist perfectionist…

Contact me

TG: https://l.xpdbk.com/dt52S6

Email: huaweilaomke402@gmail.com

Discord Guys: https://discord.gg/5hPzGNUvSS

🌵My hobbies:

Interests and hobbies: The interests are too extensive, so I won’t list them. Anyway, it’s “know everything, but not good at everything”.

About the site

The name of the site is xpdbk. When I registered the domain name, I thought about a name that was easy to pronounce for a long time, and I came up with such a thing. In fact, the meaning of this name is Little Pang’s Blog

Build a site:

Why build this blog?

This blog is built to share some more interesting and fun things, and at the same time record some tossing processes. The core reason is because I want to localize the articles I wrote and don’t want to be deleted

How to start a blog?

you can learn from the basics

Why static framework - Hugo?

In fact, I used hexo and vuepress in the early days, but in the end they gave up because they were not compatible with Windows7. Later, I discovered hugo, which was quite easy to use. It avoided the bloat of npm and the excessive dependence on the network and system, which made me feel instantly It’s very cool, and the migration of the theme is more convenient. I have been using it until now, and there is a hugo-theme-stack on hugo that I am quite satisfied with. Static blogs are easier to manage and operate. A novice like me is not suitable for playing dynamic blogs at present, and dynamic blogs don’t have the spare time to deal with attacks and performance, so I have to choose static blogs…

My device

PC: Acer 4739Z 2011

Mouse: 9.9 pieces of office mouse (support DC)

Keyboard: second-hand Internet cafe green axis mechanical keyboard (model unknown)

MobilePhone: iPhone6 US 16G Rose Gold

🃏Contact:

E-mail: huaweilaomke402@gmail.com

👺Leave a comment

You can leave your footprints here, do not spread advertisements and bad remarks

January 2023

01-20 Xpdbk domain name registration

February 2023

02-08 Added an emoticon package 02-09 Start planning to build a site based on hugo framework and stack theme 02-10 “About” page added Blog Chronicle 02-13 Site Migration to WordPress Framework

March 2023

03-XX site added RSS, Music service migrated to Vercel

April 2023

May 2023

05-02 Optimized Waline’s emoticon pack loading speed

July 2023

07-16 The site-wide cache of CF CDN was cancelled, and a new CDN was used to improve the access speed of visitors

Our story continues…

computers report errors, Linux rm rf, databases are deleted , CN2 detours, all lines are blocked, all overseas websites are walled, server bombs, gateways have no response, proxy 50O, website 502, re-examined, resources are 404, SSL is all redirected, CDN does not return to the source, crawlers will never come to your home, zero eggs are included, database timeouts, front-ends are always 502, and IPs are always blocked 80,443, blue screen on Windows startup, Kernel Panic on Linux startup, five countries on macOS startup, server iDRAC/iLO/IPMI/KVM all lost connection, all routers exploded, routing table memory overflowed, switches were all looped, firewalls were all blocked, wireless channels All conflicts, CC, DDOS all come, crimped network cables are all short-circuited, BGP is all leaking meters, cabinets are all powered off, RAiD is all exploded, NAS data is all lost, optical modules are all fried, optical fibers are all different, optical modems are all hot, and electric essays, doesn’t know about biological genetics, fractured a bone before a physical examination, stepped on a ball while kicking a football, described reading comprehension as anthropomorphic, didn’t finish homework for winter vacation, network delay =999, voltmeter and ammeter cannot be distinguished clearly, potassium permanganate is not plugged with cotton, Windows update fatal error, flashing the package, the problem cannot be solved, the IDE does not respond at all, and it is impossible to ask for help Boss, when I have an idea, I am in a hurry, all the variables can’t get the value, I forget all the code I wrote, I can’t understand all my comments, the program is full of bugs after compilation, the more bugs are fixed, the more bugs are fixed, I don’t want to do it , buy Intel CPU and AMD motherboard, buy genuine Citrix Macdin, boot account error, apply silicone grease to the pins, Alipay is automatically deducted, forgetting password does not reset, apply for Great Wall
